sourcesContent:
import React, { useRef, useEffect, useState } from "react"; const MusicList = ({ musicList, handleTitleClick, handlePlay, handlePause, isPlaying, src }) => { return (
#
Title
Artist
{musicList.music.map(({ file, title, artist, duration, rawDuration }, key) => (
{key}
{ handleTitleClick(file, key, rawDuration) }}>{title}
{artist}
{duration}
{!((src === 'http://localhost:5000/music/' + file) && (isPlaying.playing)) ? { handlePlay(file, key, rawDuration) }} className="far fa-play-circle fa-2x"> : { handlePause() }} className="far fa-pause-circle fa-2x "> }
)) }
) } export default MusicList;
